summary: Paramore is an American rock band from Franklin, Tennessee, formed in 2004. The current members are Hayley Williams (lead vocals), Taylor York (guitar), and Zac Farro (drums). Their debut album, *All We Know Is Falling*, came out in 2005. The band gained popularity with their second album, *Riot!*, in 2007, and received a Grammy nomination. They've since released several successful albums, including *Brand New Eyes* and their self-titled album, which won a Grammy for Best Rock Song. The band has gone through lineup changes over the years but continues to make music and tour.
title: Paramore
